name: Your average lift experience
description:
Your average lift experience is a small game of diving deeper and deeper into the most confusing and, above all, unfunny story you've ever read or played. Your goal is to get down from a skycraper by using the next lift near you. And if it doesn't sound exciting enough already: It's main, and only, game mechanic is a quick time event where you push buttons as fast as you can or you'll lose! Fun Fun Fun!  

You only need (and can use really...) Arrow keys or W / A / S / D
OR (for the really cool people) D-Pad of your controller.

Small personal note:

First time going solo in Ludum Dare! Not my first game jam, as I was the artist on my past game jam entries. Learnt how to use Godot and GDScript and now I'm here!

This jam was a successful one, in my opinion. It really was fun and because I planned everything correctly: No crunch was needed! I think I can be proud of this game, even if it is a little bit funky and weird.

Music used:

"Sexy Time" (CC0)
by Komiku
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku

"Faster Does It" (CC BY 3.0)
by Kevin MacLeod
http://incompetech.com

"In Shadows" (CC BY 4.0)
by William Ross Chernoff's Nomads
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/William_Ross

Thank you for reading and have fun!
